messages.subject: tis true that i yell less......
messages.msgSnippet: since we went FREELY into  homeschooling. as a foster mom i also realized MUCH Of my stress was someone else s expectations of me or the RULES of they system
messages.messageBody:
since we went FREELY into homeschooling. as a foster mom i also realized
MUCH Of my stress was someone else's expectations of me or the RULES of they
system .WHICH STILL UPSET ME GREATLY! as you may have seen on the tv
interview with diane sawyer regarding the foster care system. SO MUCH damage
AFTER they are in care...from the ill regard to children. We here on this
list are all child advocates and i love that. DENISE
